name: fright & delight hat
notes:
skeletons and bats, oh my! this frightfully delightful hat uses one woolstok bundle and is perfect for the
eerie season.

experience level

* intermediate

materials

* woolstok (worsted) bundle (100% fine highland wool; 21 mini hanks: 5g/12yds each): 1 bundle (fright & delight)
* stitch marker
* tapestry needle

finished dimensions

* circumference: 21"
* height: 8"

color shown

* rusted roof no. 1311 (a)
* golden meadow no. 1308 (b)
* midnight sea no. 1317 (c)
* spun gold no. 1316 (d)
* dark chocolate no. 1313 (e)
* highland fleece no. 1303 (f)
* pressed grapes no. 1307 (g)
